name: NovelVista Learning Solutions
description: NovelVista Learning Solutions is a professionally managed training organization with specialization in IT Service Management & Project Management Certification courses. NovelVista is an Accredited Training Organization (ATO) to conduct all levels of ITIL & PRINCE2 Certification Courses. We also conduct training on Lean Six Sigma, ISO 20000/27001 & Scrum Master & Agile Methodologies. We also provide consultancy and implementation services in the field of IT Service & Project Management. Our experts consultants have helped many organizations to implement and improve ITIL processes and achieve highest ROI. We have our head office in Pune and branches in Mumbai, Bangalore, Chennai & Hyderabad. Every year we provide training to more than 5000 participants from various organizations. Our core management team consists of highly qualified professionals with vast industry experience. We have a large pool of highly qualified and accredited trainers who are working at senior positions in various organizations and delivering the professional training as freelancers exclusively for NovelVista.
